control_param.name: aniOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not Animation File(s) are generated

control_param.name: ani_output_file
control_param.desc: Root pathname for Animation Files(s) to which a filename suffix based on dimension name associated with selected variables is appended

control_param.name: naniOutVars
control_param.desc: Number of output variables specified in the aniOutVar_names list

control_param.name: aniOutVar_names
control_param.desc: List of variable names for which all values of the variable (that is, the entire dimension size) for each time step are written Animation Dimension Files(s)

control_param.name: basinOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not basin summary output files are generated

control_param.name: basinOutBaseFileName
control_param.desc: String to define the prefix for each basin summary output file

control_param.name: basinOutVars
control_param.desc: Number of variables to include in basin summary output file(s)

control_param.name: basinOutVar_names
control_param.desc: List of variable names for which output is written to basin summary Comma Separated Values (CSV) output file(s). Each variable is written to files in the order specified in basinOutVars with the prefix of each file equal to the value of basinOutBaseFileName. The suffix of the files is based on the value of basinOut_freq and will be .csv; _meanyearly.csv; _yearly.csv; _meanmonthly.csv; or _monthly.csv. Variables must be of type real or double

control_param.name: basinOut_freq
control_param.desc: Output frequency and type

control_param.name: nhruOutNcol
control_param.desc: Number of columns written per line, which can be used to generate gridded output

values.value: All values for each timestep are written on a single line as in previous versions

control_param.name: nhruOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not nhru summary output files are generated

control_param.name: nhruOutBaseFileName
control_param.desc: String to define the prefix for each nhru summary output file

control_param.name: nhruOutVars
control_param.desc: Number of variables to include in nhru summary output file(s)

control_param.name: nhruOut_format
control_param.desc: Format of values

values.value: Scientific notation with four significant digits

control_param.name: nhruOut_freq
control_param.desc: Output frequency and type

control_param.name: outputSelectDatesON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to indicate if nhru_summary output files are generated for a specified set of dates

values.value: No, output time series on basis of nhruOut_freq
Yes, specify dates in file specified by selectDatesFileName

control_param.name: nhruOutVar_names
control_param.desc: List of variable names for which output is written to nhru summary Comma Separated Values (CSV) output files(s). Each variable is written to a separate file with the prefix of each file equal to the value of nhruOutBaseFileName; variables must be of type real or double. Each variable is written to a separate file with the prefix of each file equal to the value of nhruOutBaseFileName. The suffix of the files is based on the value of nhruOut_freq and will be .csv; _meanyearly.csv; _yearly.csv; _meanmonthly.csv; or _monthly.csv. Variables must be of type real or double

control_param.name: selectDatesFileName
control_param.desc: File that contains the set of dates to output values of nhru_summary output files in chronological order with dates specified as YEAR MONTH DAY with space(s) and/or comma separating YEAR and MONTH and MONTH and DAY (e.g. 1959 09 01)

control_param.name: nsegmentOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether nsegment summary output files are generated

values.value: yes and use values of nhm_seg as column heading

control_param.name: nsegmentOutBaseFileName
control_param.desc: String to define the prefix for each nsegment summary output file

control_param.name: nsegmentOutVars
control_param.desc: Number of variables to include in nsegment summary output file(s)

control_param.name: nsegmentOutVar_names
control_param.desc: List of variable names for which output is written to nsegment summary Comma Separated Values (CSV) output files(s). Each variable is written to a separate file with the prefix of each file equal to the value of nsegmentOutBaseFileName; variables must be of type real or double; the suffix of the files is based on the value of nsegmentOut_freq and will be .csv; _meanyearly.csv; _yearly.csv; _meanmonthly.csv; or _monthly.csv

control_param.name: nsegmentOut_format
control_param.desc: Format of values

values.value: Scientific notation with four significant digits

control_param.name: nsegmentOut_freq
control_param.desc: Output frequency and type

control_param.name: nsubOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not nsub summary output files are generated

control_param.name: nsubOutBaseFileName
control_param.desc: String to define the prefix for each nsub summary output file

control_param.name: nsubOutVars
control_param.desc: Number of variables to include in nsub summary output file(s)

control_param.name: nsubOutVar_names
control_param.desc: List of variable names for which output is written to nsub summary Comma Separated Values (CSV) output files(s). Each variable is written to a separate file with the prefix of each file equal to the value of nsubOutBaseFileName; variables must be of type real or double. Each variable is written to a separate file with the prefix of each file equal to the value of nsubOutBaseFileName. The suffix of the files is based on the value of nsubOut_freq and will be .csv; _meanyearly.csv; _yearly.csv; _meanmonthly.csv; or _monthly.csv. Variables must be of type real or double

control_param.name: nsubOut_format
control_param.desc: Format of values

values.value: Scientific notation with four significant digits

control_param.name: nsubOut_freq
control_param.desc: Output frequency and type

control_param.name: statsON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not the Statistics Variables File is generated

control_param.name: stat_var_file
control_param.desc: Pathname for Statistics Variables File

control_param.name: nstatVars
control_param.desc: Number of variables to include in Statistics Variables File and names specified in statVar_names

control_param.name: statVar_element
control_param.desc: List of identification numbers corresponding to variables specified in statVar_names list (1 to variable's dimension size)

control_param.name: statVar_names
control_param.desc: List of variable names for which output is written to Statistics Variables File

control_param.name: bias_adjust_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if temperature adjusts are changed to (a) improve the calculation of precipitation temperature used to calculate the form of precipitation as rain, snow or mixed; (b) use offset parameters from minimum air temperature adjustment parameters to adjust maximum air temperatures as it is possible in automated calibration methods maximum air temperatures could be set less than minimum air temperature; (c) allow for persistent snowpacks by using the antecedent snowpack water equivalent instead of setting to 0.0 on first Julian day of the water year; (d) set the temperature of rain that is added to a snowpack to (tavgc+tmax_allrain_c)*0.5 instead of (tmaxc+tmax_allsnow_c)*0.5 for mixed precipitation events

control_param.name: cascade_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if HRU cascades are computed

control_param.name: cascadegw_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if GWR cascades are computed

values.value: GWR cascades are set equal to the HRU cascades and parameters gw_up_id, gw_strmseg_down_in, gw_down_id, and gw_pct_up are not required

control_param.name: cbh_active_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify whether to input values in CBH files for a specified number of HRUs less than nhru, such as only active HRUs

control_param.name: cbh_binary_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify whether to input CBH files in a binary format using the samer order of values as the text file version

control_param.name: cbh_check_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if CBH values are validated each time step

control_param.name: csvON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether to output Comma-Separated-Values (CSV) file with simulated flows with 4 decimal places for segments specified by poi_gage_segment and poi_gage_id

values.value: yes, with date tag year-month-day followed by 51 basin variables and simulated flow as comma separated values
yes, with date tag year month day followed by simulated flows as a space delimited file
yes, with date tag year-month-day followed by simulated flows as comma separated values

control_param.name: dispGraphsBuffSize
control_param.desc: Number of time steps to wait before updating the runtime graph

control_param.name: ndispGraphs
control_param.desc: Number of plots included in the runtime graph

control_param.name: dispVar_element
control_param.desc: List of identification numbers corresponding to variables specified in dispVar_names list (1 to variable's dimension size)

control_param.name: dispVar_names
control_param.desc: List of variable names for which plots are output to the runtime graph

control_param.name: dispVar_plot
control_param.desc: List of variable names for which plots are output to the runtime graph

control_param.name: mapOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not mapped output file(s) by a specified number of columns (parameter ncol) of daily, monthly, yearly, or total simulation results is generated

control_param.name: nmapOutVars
control_param.desc: Number of variables to include in mapped output file(s)

control_param.name: mapOutVar_names
control_param.desc: List of variable names for which output is written to mapped output files(s); variables must be of type real or double.

control_param.name: dprst_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if depression-storage simulation is computed

control_param.name: dprst_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate to use time series of surface-depression transfer flow rates from the dprst_transfer_file

control_param.name: dyn_covden_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of plant-canopy density values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s)

control_param.name: dyn_covtype_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of plant-canopy type values are input in Dynamic Parameter File covtype_dynamic

control_param.name: dyn_dprst_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of surface-depression values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s)

control_param.name: dyn_fallfrost_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of transpiration start Julian day values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s)

control_param.name: dyn_imperv_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of impervious values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s)

control_param.name: dyn_intcp_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of plant canopy interception values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s)

control_param.name: dyn_potet_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of potential ET coefficient values are input in Dynamic Parameter File potet_coef_dynamic to update coefficients for the specified month for the selected potential ET module specified by control parameter et_module

values.value: jh_coef, pt_alpha, hs_krs, hamon_coef, epan_coef, potet_cbh_adj, and pm_n_coef (potet_jh, potet_pt, potet_hs, potet_hamon, potet_pan, climate_hru, and potet_pm modules)
jh_coef_hru, pm_d_coef (used in potet_jh and potet_pm modules)

control_param.name: dyn_radtrncf_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of solar radiation values are input in Dynamic Parameter File radtrncf_dynamic

control_param.name: dyn_snareathresh_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of snow-area threshold values are input in Dynamic Parameter File snareathresh_dynamic

control_param.name: dyn_soil_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of soil-water capacity values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s)

control_param.name: dyn_springfrost_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of transpiration start Julian day values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s)

control_param.name: dyn_sro2dprst_imperv_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of fraction of surface runoff from the impervious portion of an HRU are input in Dynamic Parameter File

control_param.name: dyn_sro2dprst_perv_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of fraction of surface runoff from the pervious portion of an HRU are input in Dynamic Parameter File

control_param.name: dyn_transp_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of transpiration month values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s)

control_param.name: dyn_transp_on_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of variable transp_on are input in a Dynamic Parameter File

control_param.name: dynamic_param_log_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of the log file that summarizes dynamic parameter changes for parameters not related to soilzone and land surface

control_param.name: dynamic_soil_param_log_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of the log file that summarizes dynamic parameter changes for soilzone and land surface related parameters

control_param.name: external_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate to use external transfer flow rates from the external_transfer_file

control_param.name: gwr_swale_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if GWR swales are allowed

values.value: groundwater flow goes to groundwater sink
groundwater flow goes to stream segment specified using parameter hru_segment

control_param.name: gwr_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate to use groundwater transfer flow rates from the gwr_transfer_file

control_param.name: init_vars_from_file
control_param.desc: Flag to specify whether or not the Initial Conditions File is specified as an input file

values.value: yes and use parameters dprst_frac_init, snowpack_init, segment_flow_init, elevlake_init, gwstor_init, (soil_rechr_init, soil_moist_init, ssstor_init for model_mode=PRMS or GSFLOW) or (soil_rechr_init_frac, soil_moist_init_frac, and ssstor_init_frac for model_mode=PRMS5 or GSFLOW5), and stream_tave_init

yes and use parameters (soil_rechr_init, soil_moist_init, ssstor_init for model_mode=PRMS or GSFLOW) or (soil_rechr_init_frac, soil_moist_init_frac, and ssstor_init_frac for model_mode=PRMS5 or GSFLOW5)

control_param.name: lake_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate to use lake HRU transfer flow rates from the lake_transfer_file

control_param.name: orad_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify whether or not the variable orad is specified as the last column of the swrad_day CBH file

control_param.name: parameter_check_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if selected parameter values validation checks are treated as warnings or errors

control_param.name: print_debug
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate type of debug output

values.value: Minimal output to screen and no model_output_file

control_param.name: prms_warmup
control_param.desc: Number of years to simulate before writing mapped results, Basin, nhru, nsub, or nsegment Summary Output Files

control_param.name: save_vars_to_file
control_param.desc: Flag to determine if an Initial Conditions File will be generated at the end of simulation

control_param.name: segment_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate to use stream segment transfer flow rates from the segment_transfer_file

control_param.name: stream_temp_shade_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate how shade is used in the stream_temp module

control_param.name: strmtemp_humidity_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify where humidity information is read for use by the stream_temp module; strmflow_module must be set to muskingum, muskingum_mann, strmflow_in_out, or muskingum_lake.

values.value: CBH file specified by control parameter humidity_day
Data file with values assigned based on parameter seg_humidity_sta

control_param.name: subbasin_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if internal subbasin are computed

control_param.name: end_time
control_param.desc: Simulation end date and time specified in order in the control item as: year, month, day, hour, minute, second

control_param.name: start_time
control_param.desc: Simulation start date and time specified in order in the control item as: year, month, day, hour, minute, second

control_param.name: initial_deltat
control_param.desc: Initial time step for the simulation

control_param.name: covden_sum_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for summer plant-cover density used to set values of covden_sum for each HRU

control_param.name: covden_win_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for winter plant-cover density used to set values of covden_win for each HRU

control_param.name: covtype_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values used to set values of cov_type for each HRU

control_param.name: csv_output_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of CSV output file

control_param.name: dprst_depth_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values used to set values of dprst_depth_avg

control_param.name: dprst_frac_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values used to set values of dprst_frac

control_param.name: dprst_transfer_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed flow rates for transfers from surface-depression storage

control_param.name: et_module
control_param.desc: Module name for potential evapotranspiration method (climate_hru, potet_jh, potet_hamon, potet_hs, potet_pt, potet_pm, potet_pm_sta, or potet_pan)

values.value: Reads distributed potential evapotranspiration values for each HRU directly from pre-processed files.
Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Hamon formulation (Hamon, 1961).
Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Hargreaves-Samani formulation (Hargreaves and Samani, 1982).
Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Jensen-Haise formulation (Jensen and Haise, 1963).
Computes the potential evapotranspiration for each HRU by using pan-evaporation data.
Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Penman-Monteith formulation (Penman, 1948; Monteith, 1965); requires windspeed and humidity specified in CBH Files.
Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Penman-Monteith formulation (Penman, 1948; Monteith, 1965); requires windspeed and humidity specified in the Data File.
Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Priestley-Taylor formulation (Priestley and Taylor, 1972).

control_param.name: executable_desc
control_param.desc: Descriptive text to identify the PRMS executable

control_param.name: executable_model
control_param.desc: Pathname (full or relative) of the PRMS executable

control_param.name: external_transfer_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed flow rates for transfers from external sources

control_param.name: fallfrost_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter fall_frost

control_param.name: gwr_transfer_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed flow rates for transfers from groundwater reservoir storage

control_param.name: humidity_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed humidity input data for each HRU to specify variable humidity_hru-percentage

control_param.name: imperv_frac_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter hru_percent_imperv

control_param.name: imperv_stor_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter imperv_stor_max

control_param.name: lake_transfer_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed flow rates for transfers from lake HRUs

control_param.name: model_mode
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate the simulation mode

values.value: write CBH files of minimum and maximum air temperature (variables tminf and tmaxf-Fahrenheit); precipitation (variable hru_ppt-inches); solar radiation (variable swrad-Langleys); potential ET (variable potet-inches); and/or transpiration flag (variable transp_on)
write files of all declared parameters and variables in the executable

control_param.name: model_output_file
control_param.desc: Pathname for Water-Budget File for results module basin_sum

control_param.name: outVarON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not combined basin, nhru, nsegment summary output files are generated

control_param.name: outVar_base_filename
control_param.desc: String to define the prefix for each combined summary output file

control_param.name: outVar_names
control_param.desc: List of variable names for which output is written to the combine summary file

control_param.name: param_file
control_param.desc: Pathname(s) for Parameter File(s)

control_param.name: potet_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed potential-ET input data for each HRU to specify variable potet (units: inches/day)

control_param.name: potet_coef_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed potential evapotranspiration coefficient values where the parameter is dependent on the value of et_module

control_param.name: precip_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed precipitation input data for each HRU to specify variable precip-inches

control_param.name: precip_map_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of pre-processed precipitation input data to be mapped to each HRU to specify variable precip_map_values (units based on value specified for parameter precip_units)

control_param.name: precip_module
control_param.desc: Module name for precipitation-distribution method

values.value: Reads distributed precipitation values for each HRU directly from pre-processed files.

Determines the form of precipitation and distributes precipitation and temperatures to each HRU on the basis of measurements at stations with closest elevation or shortest distance to the respective HRU.

Determines the form of precipitation and distributes it to each HRU by using monthly correction factors to account for differences in altitude, spatial variation, topography, and measurement gage efficiency and observed data from one station. Note, each HRU uses data from a single station, but, multiple stations can be used in a model with each HRU assigned data from one of those stations.
Determines the form of precipitation and distributes it to each HRU by using an inverse distance weighting scheme.
Determines the form of precipitation and distributes it to each HRU by using monthly lapse rates.
Distributes precipitation and determines form to each HRU by using time series precipitation data using an area-weighted method and correction factors to each HRU.

Determines the form of precipitation and distributes precipitation and temperatures to each HRU by using a multiple linear regression of measured data from a group of measurement stations or from atmospheric model simulation.

control_param.name: radtrncf_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter rad_trncf

control_param.name: segment_transfer_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed flow rates for transfers from stream segments

control_param.name: snareathresh_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter snarea_thresh

control_param.name: snow_intcp_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter snow_intcp

control_param.name: soilmoist_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter soil_moist_max

control_param.name: soilrechr_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter soil_rechr_max_frac

control_param.name: soilzone_module
control_param.desc: Module name for soil zone method

values.value: Computes inflows to and outflows from the soil zone of each HRU and includes inflows from infiltration, groundwater, and upslope HRUs, and outflows to gravity drainage, interflow, and surface runoff to down-slope HRUs.

control_param.name: solrad_module
control_param.desc: Module name for solar-radiation-distribution method

values.value: Distributes solar radiation to each HRU and estimates missing solar radiation data using a relation between solar radiation and cloud cover.
Reads distributed solar radiation values for each HRU directly from pre-processed files.
Distributes solar radiation to each HRU and estimates missing solar radiation data using a maximum temperature per degree-day relation.

control_param.name: springfrost_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter spring_frost

control_param.name: srain_intcp_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter srain_intcp

control_param.name: sro2dprst_imperv_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter sro_to_dprst_imperv

control_param.name: sro2dprst_perv_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter sro_to_dprst_perv

control_param.name: srunoff_module
control_param.desc: Module name for surface-runoff/infiltration computation method

values.value: Computes surface runoff and infiltration for each HRU by using a linear variable-source-area method allowing for cascading flow.
Computes surface runoff and infiltration for each HRU by using a nonlinear variable-source-area method allowing for cascading flow.

control_param.name: strmflow_module
control_param.desc: Module name for streamflow routing simulation method

values.value: Computes flow in the stream network using the Muskingum routing method (Linsley and others, 1982).
Computes flow in the stream network using the Muskingum routing method and flow and storage in on-channel lake using several methods.
Computes flow in the stream network using the Muskingum routing method with Manning’s N equation.
Computes daily streamflow as the sum of surface runoff, shallow-subsurface flow (interflow), detention reservoir flow, and groundwater flow.
Routes water between segments in the stream network by setting the outflow to the inflow.

control_param.name: swrad_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed solar-radiation input data for each HRU to specify variable swrad-Langleys

control_param.name: temp_module
control_param.desc: Module name for temperature-distribution method (climate_hru, temp_1sta, temp_dist2, temp_laps, ide_dist, or xyz_dist)

values.value: Reads distributed minimum and maximum air temperature values for each HRU directly from pre-processed files

Determines the form of precipitation and distributes precipitation and temperatures to each HRU on the basis of measurements at stations with closest elevation or shortest distance to the respective HRU
Distributes maximum and minimum temperatures to each HRU by using a basin-wide lapse rate applied to the temperature data, adjusted for distance, measured at each station
Distributes maximum and minimum temperatures to each HRU by computing a daily lapse rate with temperature data measured at a base station and a lapse station with differing altitudes
Distributes maximum and minimum temperatures to each HRU by using time series temperature data using an area-weighted method and correction factors to each HRU
Distributes maximum and minimum temperatures to each HRU by using temperature data measured at one station, similar to temp_1sta except there is no lapse rate

Determines the form of precipitation and distributes precipitation and temperatures to each HRU by using a multiple linear regression of measured data from a group of measurement stations or from atmospheric model simulation

control_param.name: tmax_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed maximum air temperature input data for each HRU to specify variable tmaxf-degrees Fahrenheit

control_param.name: tmin_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed minimum air temperature input data for each HRU to specify variable tminf-degrees Fahrenheit

control_param.name: tmax_map_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of pre-processed maximum air temperature input data to be mapped to each HRU to specify variable tmax_map_values to set variable tmaxf (units: degrees Fahrenheit)

control_param.name: tmin_map_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of pre-processed minimum air temperature input data to be mapped to each HRU to specify variable tmin_map_values to set variable tminf (units: degrees Fahrenheit)

control_param.name: transp_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed transpiration on or off flag for each HRU file to specify variable transp_on

control_param.name: transp_module
control_param.desc: Module name for transpiration simulation method

values.value: Reads distributed transpiration values for each HRU directly from pre-processed files.
Determines whether the current time step is in a period of active transpiration by the killing frost method.
Determines whether the current time step is in a period of active transpiration by the temperature index method.

control_param.name: transp_on_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values used to set values for dynamic variable transp_on

control_param.name: transpbeg_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter transp_beg

control_param.name: transpend_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter transp_end

control_param.name: var_init_file
control_param.desc: Pathname for Initial Conditions input file

control_param.name: var_save_file
control_param.desc: Pathname for the Initial Conditions File to be generated at end of simulation

control_param.name: windspeed_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed wind speed input data for each HRU to specify variable windspeed_hru-meters/second

control_param.name: wrain_intcp_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter wrain_intcp

control_param.name: data_file
control_param.desc: Pathname(s) for measured input Data File(s), typically a single Data File is specified

control_param.name: snarea_curve_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify snow depletion curve calculation method

values.value: Specify snow depletion curves with parameters hru_deplcrv and snarea_curve
Compute using parameters snarea_a, snarea_b, snarea_c, and snarea_d

control_param.name: soilzone_aet_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify soil-water evapotranspiration (ET) computation method. Either it's based on unsatisfied potential ET (PET) and for GSFLOW or GSFLOW5 modes replenish the upper zone of capillary reservoir using the fraction of the upper zone of the capillary reservoir (as was done in previous versions) or it's based on PET when specified equal to 1 and replenish by first filling the lower zone and then the upper zone to their maximum water-holding capactities; set to 0 for downward compatibility of old models, though it is recommended setting to 1 for new models.

values.value: Compute soil-water ET based on unsatisfied ET and old upper zone replenishment method
Compute based on PET and new replenishment method

control_param.name: stream_temp_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify whether to simulate stream temperature; strmflow_module must be set to muskingum, muksingum_mann, strmflow_in_out, or muskingum_lake.

control_param.name: albedo_cbh_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify whether to input snowpack albedo from a CBH file

control_param.name: albedo_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed snowpack albedo input data for each HRU to specify variable albedo_hru (units: decimal fraction)

control_param.name: cloud_cover_cbh_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify whether to input snowpack albedo from a CBH file

control_param.name: cloud_cover_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed cloud cover input data for each HRU to specify variable cloud_cover_cbh (units: decimal fraction)

control_param.name: humidity_cbh_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify whether to input humidity from a CBH file

control_param.name: snow_cloudcover_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if radiation transmission is computed based on HRU-based variables or basin-wide variables as is done in previous model versions

control_param.name: windspeed_cbh_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify whether to input windspeed from a CBH file

control_param.name: frozen_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if continuous frozen ground index simulation is computed

control_param.name: forcing_check_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate performance of precipitation and temperature checks for hru_ppt < 0.0, hru_rain < 0.0, hru_snow < 0.0, tmax < tmin, tminf < -150.0 and tmaxf > 200.0

control_param.name: glacier_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if glacier simulation is computed

control_param.name: mbInit_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate initial mass balance of glaciers

values.value: Use first year of climate data
Constant mass balance gradient above and below equilibrium line altitude (ELA)

control_param.name: no_snow_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if snow and glacier (if active) computations are computed

control_param.name: seg2hru_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate use of segment_to_hru to apply streamflow to capillary reservoir of associated HRUs

control_param.name: write_binary_nhru_flag
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether to output nhru_summary values as binary files
